name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft, deep-fried khoya balls soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

name: Rasgulla
description: Spongy white balls made from chhena (cottage cheese) soaked in light sugar syrup.

name: Kaju Katli
description: Thin diamond-shaped cashew fudge made with ground cashews and sugar.

name: Soan Papdi
description: Flaky and crispy sweet with a melt-in-mouth texture, made from gram flour and sugar.
